0.name: Red
0.description: Leaps forward and fire consecutive shots, each shot dealing X% of physical damage. You are immune to crowd-control and stagger during the skill animation

1.name: Yellow
1.description: Leaps forward your enemy to kick before following up with a shot, dealing X% physical damage and marking them. When attacking marked enemy, fire an additional shot dealing Y%

2.name: Blue
2.description: Fires a shock bomb, dealing X% physical damage and create an energy circle. Enemies caught within the energy circle take Y% physical damage for 3s. This skill has limited range and will detonate if the target is out of range

3.name: Basic
3.description: Deals a total of A% physical damage

4.name: Ultimate
4.description: Consume 100 energy to call in an energy cannon. Each shot fired by this cannon deals A% physical damage

5.name: QTE
5.description: Deals A% physical damage

1.description: After a 3 orb combo, the next red orb skill will have additional cannon shots, dealing A% physical damage

2.name: Leader
2.description: 15% physical damage and 10% movement speed increase to all teammates

3.name: Passive 1
3.description: Deal 15% more damage when attacking enemies within the energy circle

4.name: Passive 2
4.description: Deal 20% more damage to marked enemies

5.name: Passive 3
5.description: Physical damage is increased by 10% after a 3 orb combo. This buff lasts for 5s and stacks up to 3 times

2.name: Blue

3.name: Basic

4.name: Ultimate

5.description: Deals A% physical damage

0.description: Damage is increased by A%

1.name: Core
1.description: 3 orb combos and ultimate will gain fire energy, when the fire bar reaches 50% full, you will enter fire mode. Basic attacks and skills get additional effects in fire mode and gains A% of fire damage increase. Loses 5% of fire energy per second in fire mode

2.name: Leader
2.description: When all 3 characters are different classes, damage increase by 10%, attack based characters gain an additional 5%

3.name: Passive 1
3.description: Gain an additional 10% in fire damage in fire mode

4.name: Passive 2
4.description: Skills gain 10% increase in damage when in fire mode

5.name: Passive 3
5.description: Enemies damaged by ultimate receives 15% more fire damage, lasts for 5s

0.name: Red
0.description: 闪身攻击正前方范围内的目标，根据消球数每次攻击造成X%的物理伤害，3消时最后一次攻击额外造成Y%的物理伤害并将目标击飞，释放过程中霸体

1.name: Yellow
1.description: 向前方突击并穿过途经敌人，伤害沿途的目标，根据消球数造成X%的物理伤害

2.name: Blue
2.description: 强化自身能量供给，根据消球数提升自身20%/30%/50%的移动速度，并在攻击时根据消球数额外附加2次X%的物理伤害。释放剑气时，将使额外伤害增强为释放额外剑气，每段剑气造成Y%的物理伤害

3.name: Basic
3.description: 剑术5式进攻目标，每式造成A%/B%/C%/D%/E%的物理伤害，闪避之后可以立即接第3段普攻

4.name: Ultimate
4.description: 释放斩击攻击前方目标，共造成A%的物理伤害

5.name: QTE

2.name: Leader
2.description: 全队进攻型构造体攻击增加10%，会心增加5%

0.description: Increase healing effectiveness by A%

1.name: Core
1.description: 任意3消后下次红球技能将释放激光束群。共造成A%的物理伤害

2.name: Leader
2.description: 全队角色生命值加10%

3.name: Passive 1
3.description: 释放大招后，获得3个蓝球

4.name: Passive 2
4.description: 丽芙在后台未上场时，场上队友物理伤害增加10%

5.name: Passive 3
5.description: 释放必杀-苍穹星降后，全伤害增加20%，持续8秒

0.name: Red
0.description: Fires cannons once, dealing X% physical damage

1.name: Yellow
1.description: Create a square cube around the target. The cube will force the target into slowmo, lasting for 1/2/3 seconds, dealing A%/B%/C% of lightning damage and converge surrounding enemies towards the square minimally. When the square is gone, an explosion will occur dealing A% of lightning damage

2.name: Blue
2.description: Creates a laser wall at target. Enemies who walks through the wall will get electrified, dealing X% of lightning damage per second and decrease movement speed by 20%/40%/80%, marking the enemy for 8s, the wall will last for 2/4/6 seconds

3.name: Basic
3.description: Deals a total of A% of physical damage

4.name: Ultimate
4.description: Consume 100 energy to cast down a lightning field. Allies within the field gains a random orb every second and gains A% attack. Enemies movement within the field is 50% lower

5.name: QTE
5.description: Summons an EX lightning strike, dealing A% of lightning damage and leaves a field, healing allies within the field for B% of attack damage

0.name: Class-specific Passive
0.description: Increase healing effectiveness by A%

1.name: Core
1.description: Basic attacks will mark the enemy and have a 30% chance to summon a lightning strike, dealing A% of lightning damage. Red orbs have a 30%/60%/100% chance to trigger a lightning strike. After 4 triggers, the next trigger will summon an EX lightning strike, dealing B% of lightning damage and heals allies for C% of your attack damage

2.name: Leader
2.description: Increase all character's health and attack damage by 5%

3.name: Passive 1
3.description: Allies near the EX lightning strike gains 20% lightning damage

4.name: Passive 2
4.description: Increase lightning strike damage by 25%

5.name: Passive 3
5.description: Enemies within the cube has 15% lower lightning resistance
